definition: mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物

sentences.english: IntroductionThe centrosome is the major microtubule organizing center ( MTOC) of mammalian cells.
sentences.chinese: 中心体是哺乳类细胞主要的微管组织中心。

sentences.english: Some examples of mammals are man, pigs and dogs.
sentences.chinese: 一些哺乳类动物的例子是人类，猪和狗。

sentences.english: Other seed-eating mammals may become troublesome .
sentences.chinese: 其它取食种子的哺乳类也会引起麻烦。

sentences.english: Human beings are the tops of animals and also are mammals.
sentences.chinese: 人是万物之灵也是哺乳类动物。

sentences.english: Ferrets are another mammalian species known to be susceptible to infection.
sentences.chinese: 雪貂是另一种已知易受感染的哺乳类动物物种。

sentences.english: The elephant is the only mammal that can’t jump.
sentences.chinese: 大象是唯一一种不会跳的哺乳类动物。

sentences.english: Our understanding of monogamy draws heavily on birds rather than mammals.
sentences.chinese: 我们对一夫一妻制的理解主要来自鸟类而非哺乳类。

sentences.english: In regard to animals, Diphyodont evolved into Reptilia, which evolved into mammals.
sentences.chinese: 动物是由两栖进化为爬虫，再进化为哺乳类。

sentences.english: When dinosaurs disappeared about 65 million years ago, mammals thrived.
sentences.chinese: 当恐龙在六千五百万年前消失后，哺乳类便兴盛起来。

sentences.english: Mammals arose from a fairly primitive reptile in the Mesozoic era.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳类起源于中生代宛若原始的爬虫类。

sentences.english: Several endogenous ligands of benzodiazepine receptor(BZR) had been found in the mammalian brain .
sentences.chinese: 已证实哺乳类动物脑中存在有安定受体的内源性配基。

definition: reptiles/also written 爬行動物|爬行动物
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
